alert.note: Alert for Calloway; Carlisle; Graves; Hickman; Marshall (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 5:17PM EDT until April 13 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR CALLOWAY...MARSHALL...NORTHEASTERN HICKMAN...EASTERN CARLISLE AND GRAVES COUNTIES... At 416 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Lovelaceville to near Sedalia to near Sharon, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Murray, Mayfield, Benton, Lynnville, Sedalia, Wingo, Hardin, Hazel, Water Valley, Lowes, New Concord, Fancy Farm, Kirksey, Brewers, Aurora, Harris Grove and Symsonia. This includes Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 7 and 48. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for western Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
